name: Catalyst: The Ruins
description:
"The year is 605, and in your home— the country of Corcaea— the souls of mankind belong to demons."
SYNOPSIS

A phenomenon known as the Catalyst is what's responsible for turning men into monsters. The last of humanity is counting on you to find a cure, as the study of this insidious phenomenon is your life's work. 

You are Father Richard Anscham, leader of the Church of Mercy— but what does that mean to you?

Whether you wish to uphold the teachings of compassion, become a paragon of Vengeance, or want to lead a life for yourself rather than the Gods; in this dark fantasy visual novel, you define yourself and your principles.

Explore and survive in a world of horror, action, adventure, romance, and mystery.

Meet a rich cast of characters— with or without humanity.

Enter the ruins that cover the land with nothing but your dog and your faith.

Get ready to conquer your demons, inside and out.
